entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then steady.
